text: Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fa'akhrajna Bihi Nabata Kulli Shay'in Fa'akhrajna Minhu KhaÄ‘iraan Nukhriju Minhu Habbaan Mutarakibaan Wa Mina An-Nakhli Min Tal`iha Qinwanun Daniyatun Wa Jannatin Min 'A`nabin Wa Az-Zaytuna Wa Ar-Rummana Mushtabihaan Wa Ghayra Mutashabihin Anzuru 'Ila Thamarihi 'Idha 'Athmara Wa Yan`ihi 'Inna Fi Dhalikum La'ayatin Liqawmin Yu'uminuna
